entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
